title: Top Places to visit in Mungeli, Chhattisgarh
content:
Mungeli is a town and a municipality in Mungeli district in the Indian state of Chhattisgarh. Pin code of Mungeli is 495334. Mungeli is a newly formed district from the separation of bilaspur district.
Mungeli district is a district of Chhattisgarh, India,[1] with headquarters in Mungeli.
